questions.label: Is PPE provided to staff on site?
questions.helpText: Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) is essential for worker safety. Employers are legally required to provide appropriate PPE where hazards exist.

No.title: Provide PPE to protect staff
No.body: Personal protective equipment reduces injury risk. Ensure staff have suitable PPE for their tasks and provide training on correct use.

messageOnSelect.Partially: Consider completing PPE provision so all staff have required protection.
messageOnSelect.*: Keep records of PPE distribution and training for compliance.

questions.label: Which PPE items are provided?
questions.helpText: Different tasks require different PPE. Ensure the equipment matches the hazards present and staff are trained in proper use and maintenance.
